revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Adaptec |model=AWN-8084 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=11/2002 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf=BroMax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=O6M-WG314 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=Adaptec |default_ssid_regex=^Adaptec$ |default_ip=192.168.8.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.adaptec.com/en-us/support/_eol/wireless_prod/awn-8084/ Support page] :[http://download.adaptec.com/pdfs/user_guides/awn_8084_ug.pdf User's Guide]
The FCC ID for this device is not valid. The device does highly resemble the similar WA301-UF and WA304-UF devices, which have a FCC ID of O6M-WA304-UF. :The WA30x-UF are '''Ubicom''' IP2022 based with an '''Intersil''' PRISM 3 PCMCIA wireless module.
At least one label for this device has a MAC with a 00:00:D1 ('''Adaptec''') OUI. The manual from '''Adapted''' shows the device with 00:02:DD ('''BroMax''') OUIs for LAN and WAN.
The default SSID is presumed to be '''Adaptec'''.
==Images== [[File:Adaptec AWN-8084.jpg|300px]][[Has images::external| ]]
